description:

outer carton is cream with tan stripes with dark brown "chops" on it; wooden box with inscriptions; paper under tie; fabric is grey with cream and gold accent; image on a landscape with bridge and figure in LL and building in LR with four lines of inscription in UR corner
title: Landscape (Spires)
